text: He addresses the bullies by telling them to ` ` fix their hearts,'' and points out that bullying hurts people. ` ` Fix your heart, though. For real,'' he continues. ` ` I'm happy that I can handle this... I'm not tripping.'' He points out that there are kids who can not handle the trolling. Lonnie says to them, ` ` If y'all kids are watching this, don't trip. Be who you want to be. Do what you want to do. Do you. Be you. Believe in yourself.''
